termsContent:
Service Scope
Drain Go provides a platform to connect customers with independent service providers (Drivers) for sewage tank cleaning and related services. Drain Go itself does not perform cleaning services.

Booking & Confirmation
Service bookings are subject to availability of Drivers. A booking is considered confirmed only after a Driver accepts the request.

Pricing & Payments
Prices shown in the app are estimated and may vary based on tank size, location, complexity, or additional work. Payments must be made through approved payment methods available in the app.

Cancellation & Refunds
Customers may cancel bookings within the allowed cancellation window. Late cancellations or no-shows may attract cancellation charges. Refunds, if applicable, will be processed as per Drain Goâ€™s refund policy.

Customer Responsibilities
Customers must ensure safe and clear access to the sewage tank location. Drain Go is not responsible for delays or service issues caused by restricted access or unsafe conditions.

Health & Safety
Customers agree to disclose any known hazards at the service location. Drain Go is not liable for service refusal by Drivers due to unsafe or unhygienic conditions.

Service Quality & Complaints
Any service-related issues must be reported within 24 hours of service completion through the appâ€™s support section.

Limitation of Liability
Drain Go is not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the service provided by Drivers.

Account Usage
Customers are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account credentials and all activities performed through their account.

Platform Role Disclaimer
Drain Go acts solely as a technology platform to facilitate connections between customers and independent Drivers.

Force Majeure
Drain Go shall not be held liable for service delays or failures due to events beyond reasonable control.

Modification of Terms
Drain Go reserves the right to modify these Terms & Conditions at any time.

Governing Law & Jurisdiction
These Terms shall be governed by the laws of India.

Contact & Grievance Redressal
Email: support@draingo.com
Response Time: Within 48 hours

Service Outcome Disclaimer
Drain Go does not guarantee specific outcomes of cleaning services.

Property Damage Disclaimer
Drain Go shall not be responsible for damage to property caused during service delivery by Drivers.

User Misuse & Fraud
Misuse or fraudulent activity may result in account suspension or legal action.

Insurance Responsibility
Drivers are solely responsible for obtaining insurance coverage.

Tax Compliance
Drivers are responsible for reporting and paying applicable taxes.

Rating & Performance Monitoring
Driver performance may be monitored based on customer ratings and service completion rates.
